title: Shelter (Full Movie) Drama l Jennifer Connelly, Anthony Mackie

sources.title: Shelter (Full Movie) Drama l Jennifer Connelly, Anthony Mackie
sources.description:
Academy Award Winner Jennifer Connelly and Anthony Mackie (The Avengers) star in a riveting story of survival. Two strangers will find each other and rise above their struggle to get off of the streets of New York City.

Directed by Paul Bettany
2014
Starring Jennifer Connelly, Anthony Mackie

Edited for YouTube ad standards
